library.name: yFiles for HTML

properties.sourceFilesUrls: <% if(language === "typescript") {%><item url="<%= yFilesUrl %>/ide-support/yfiles-api.d.ts" /><%} else {%> <item url="<%= yFilesUrl %>/ide-support/yfiles-api.js" /><%}%>

library.CLASSES: <% if(language === "typescript") {%><root url="<%= yFilesUrl %>/ide-support/yfiles-api.d.ts" /><%} else {%> <root url="<%= yFilesUrl %>/ide-support/yfiles-api.js" /><%}%>
